title: Menjadi React Web Developer Expert
description: Learned to write consistent and clean code with linter and Clean Code principles, manage application state using Redux, perform automated testing from unit to end-to-end, deploy React apps with CI/CD, and explore the React ecosystem including Next.js, Storybook, and Styled Components.

title: Belajar Fundamental Aplikasi Web dengan React
description: Learned Property Validation, React Router, Component Lifecycle, React Context, React Hooks by reading and creating a web app.

title: Belajar Membuat Aplikasi Web dengan React
description: Learned basic of react, stateful and reusable component by reading and creating a web app.

title: Belajar Dasar Pemrograman JavaScript
description: Learned to write clean JavaScript code, use Object-Oriented Programming, apply Functional Programming, handle asynchronous processes, manage data structures, and organize code using modules.

title: Belajar Dasar Pemrograman Web
description: Learned to build structured web pages using HTML, apply semantic elements and attributes, style pages using CSS, implement responsive layouts with Flexbox, and create a simple website project.

title: Belajar Membuat Front-End Web untuk Pemula
description: Learned to manipulate the DOM using JavaScript, create interactivity with events, and store data in the browser using Web Storage API.
